page.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
page.subtitle: Choose the subscription plan that fits your needs. Get monthly credits with automatic rollover.

subscription.title: Choose Your Plan
subscription.subtitle: Get credits every month with our subscription plans. Cancel anytime.

configurationWarning: Stripe Price IDs are not configured. Add them to your .env file to enable purchases.

creditPacks.title: Need Credits Without a Subscription?
creditPacks.subtitle: One-time credit packs that never expire. Perfect for occasional projects.
creditPacks.valueComparisonText: Subscriptions offer 11-58% cheaper credits for regular users

creditsUsedFor.question: What are credits used for?
creditsUsedFor.answer: Credits are used for API requests. Each request consumes a certain number of credits based on the operation and resources used.

creditsExpire.question: Do credits expire?
creditsExpire.answer: Subscription credits roll over month-to-month up to your plan's maximum limit as long as your subscription is active.

batchProcessing.question: What are the rate limits?
batchProcessing.answer: Free users have basic rate limits. Paid plans support higher request volumes and concurrent requests depending on your plan tier.

cancelSubscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelSubscription.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period, and any remaining credits will stay in your account.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and various other payment methods through Stripe.

freePlan.question: Is there a free plan?
freePlan.answer: Yes! Free users get initial credits to try the service. However, higher rate limits and advanced features require a paid subscription.

customPlan.title: Need a custom plan?
customPlan.description: Contact us for enterprise pricing, bulk discounts, or custom integration requirements.
